abilityEffect.en: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Aerodactyl is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Aerodactyl by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
